comments.creator: pashazadeh@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.2; WOW64; rv:6.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.1
Build ID: 20110830092941

Steps to reproduce:

I am using h2 database console (a web application with full ajax support for working with any database) for working with a database with lots of objects in the schema


Actual results:

Firefox stops responding frequently, and then resumes after about 1 or 2 minues.


Expected results:

There was no problem when I was using Firefox 3.x..., I even do my job with Opera without any problem, but Firefox 4, 5, 6 all have the same problem, and its annoying.
comments.author: pashazadeh@gmail.com

comments.author: xtc4uall@gmail.com
comments.text:
Can you point to
* a public URL and/or
* a Demo Site and/or
* attach a reduced Testcase

showing your Issue. Without that I think this ends INCOMPLETE.
You can also contact the Developers of that Web App and tell them about the Issue and maybe they can give more Details on the Issue.
